reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 41/18: PRE-ELECTION REPORT FOR 2018 PROVINCIAL ELECTION

content.content: 1. (1) A pre-election report under subsection 10 (1) of the Act is required in connection with the 2018 provincial election. (2) The deadline for the release of the pre-election report is 7 days after the day on which the Minister of Finance moves the Budget motion in 2018 under Standing Order 58 (a) of the Standing Orders of the Assembly.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A pre-election report under subsection 10 (1) of the Act is required in connection with the 2018 provincial election.

(2) The deadline for the release of the pre-election report is 7 days after the day on which the Minister of Finance moves the Budget motion in 2018 under Standing Order 58 (a) of the Standing Orders of the Assembly.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
